name: European Meme-Destroyer Simulator
description:
Based on Arabic Shitposter Simulator.

qzeq MUST play this splendid game

In this game, you eliminate all kinds of screwed off memes based on every kind of media, such as: Allo Allo, Sailor Moon, Raya Systems Games, Breaking Bad, and anything else. after you played it, you can post your score in the comment section below.

but if you don't feel like playing this game, you can always download these memes themselves and use them as profile pics, print them as stickers, share with friends as trading cards anything you wanna do. The memes all come in different tiers (entirely free), together with extras.
